channel.title: About on Ben Stenhaug

item.title: About
item.description: I majored in statistics, economics, and mathematics at the University of Wisconsin-Madison. Following college, I nearly entered a PhD program in economics but instead joined Teach for America and served as a high school math teacher in Eastern North Carolina. I then worked for nearly 3 years at Khan Academy on math content (everything from middle school to AP Statistics and AP Calculus) that is still used by millions of students worldwide.
